import React from 'react' function Book() { const selectedCategory = "Next 7 days" const books = [ { id: 'd54sd4', text: "Go for a run", time: "10:00 AM", date: "06/03/2021", day: "6", checked: false, color: '#000000', project: 'personal' }, { id: 'd54fdf', text: "Meeting", time: "09:00 AM", date: "08/03/2021", day: "1", checked: true, color: '#00ff00', project: 'work' } ] return (
{selectedCategory}
{ selectedCategory === "Next 7 days" ? : books.map(book => ) }
) } export default Book
